info.title: My Account - First Login Password Update

abstract.para: Logging In (including required password change on first login, as well as self selected username alternative to card number)

chapter.para: Login to the OWWL Online Catalog My Account with Password Update

Patrons are given temporary "dummy" barcodes when new accounts are created, or forgotten passwords are reset. Patrons MUST change their password to something more secure with their first ever OPAC login or first login after a password reset. Â Once the password is updated, they will not have to repeat this process for subsequent logins.

section.title: Procedure

listitem.para: Open a web browser and go to: [URL]
By default, your username is your library card number.
Your password is a 4 digit code provided when your account was created. If you have forgotten your password, contact your local library to have it reset.
Click Login; you will be prompted to change your password
At Password successfully updated pop-up click OK; you will be returned to the login screen
Enter your Username and new Password

section.para: To view your account details, click one of the My Account tabs
To start a search, enter a term in the search box at the top of the page and click Go!

para.emphasis: If using a public computer be sure to log out!
